remarks: Equivalence between a disjunction of two implications, and a conjunction and an implication.  Based on theorem *4.79 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 121 but with additional decidability antecedents.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 28-Mar-2018.)
statement: pm4.79dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> ( ( ( ps -> ph ) \/ ( ch -> ph ) ) <-> ( ( ps /\ ch ) -> ph ) ) ) ) $.
